languages.text: Every kill with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon permanently increases Winterscale's melee {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by +1%. While he has less than 50% of his maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, those {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} are doubled.
languages.original_text: Каждое убийство рукопашным оружием бессрочно увеличивает наносимый в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} Винтерскейла на 1%. Когда у него остается меньше 50% от максимального {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, эти {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} удваиваются.

traits.locale_text: Every kill with a melee weapon permanently increases Winterscale's melee damage and armour by +1%. While he has less than 50% maximum wounds, those bonuses are doubled.

Every kill with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon permanently increases Winterscale's melee {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by +1%. While he has less than 50% of his maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, those {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} are doubled.

Every kill with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon permanently increases Winterscale's melee {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by +1%. While he has less than 50% of his maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, those {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} are doubled.

languages.text: Cada muerte con un arma {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} aumenta permanentemente el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} cuerpo a cuerpo y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} de Winterscale un +1 %. Si sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} están por debajo del 50 % del máximo, las {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} se duplican.
languages.original_text: Every kill with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon permanently increases Winterscale's melee {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by +1%. While he has less than 50% of his maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, those {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} are doubled.

traits.locale_text: Cada muerte con un arma cuerpo a cuerpo aumenta permanentemente el daño cuerpo a cuerpo y la {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} de Winterscale un +1 %. Si sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} están por debajo del 50 % del máximo, las {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} se duplican.

languages.text: 每当温特斯凯尔使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器击杀敌人时，近战{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}都会永久提高1%。当他的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}降至50%以下时，此{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}效果翻倍。
languages.original_text: Every kill with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon permanently increases Winterscale's melee {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by +1%. While he has less than 50% of his maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, those {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} are doubled.

traits.locale_text: 每当温特斯凯尔使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器击杀敌人时，近战{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}都会永久提高1%。当他的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}降至50%以下时，此{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}效果翻倍。

languages.text: Chaque ennemi éliminé à l'aide d'une arme de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} augmente de façon permanente les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de mêlée et l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de Winterscale de +1 %. Tant que sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum est inférieure à 50 %, ces {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} sont doublés.
languages.original_text: Every kill with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon permanently increases Winterscale's melee {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by +1%. While he has less than 50% of his maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, those {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} are doubled.

traits.locale_text: Chaque ennemi éliminé à l'aide d'une une arme de mêlée augmente de façon permanente les dégâts de mêlée et l'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} de Winterscale de +1 %. Tant que sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum est inférieure à 50 %, ces {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} sont doublés.

languages.text: Jeder Kill mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfwaffe{/g} erhöht Winterzunders {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Nahkampfschaden{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} permanent um +1 %. Solange er weniger als 50 % seiner maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} hat, werden diese {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} verdoppelt.
languages.original_text: Every kill with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon permanently increases Winterscale's melee {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by +1%. While he has less than 50% of his maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, those {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} are doubled.

traits.locale_text: Jeder Kill mit einer Nahkampfwaffe erhöht Winterzunders Nahkampfschaden und {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} permanent um +1 %. Solange er weniger als 50 % seiner maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} hat, werden diese {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} verdoppelt.

languages.text: 近接武器で殺害するたびに、ウィンタースケールの{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が永続的に +1%上昇する。彼の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が最大値の50%以下の場合、この{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}は2倍となる。
languages.original_text: Every kill with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon permanently increases Winterscale's melee {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by +1%. While he has less than 50% of his maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, those {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} are doubled.

traits.locale_text: 近接武器で殺害するたびに、ウィンタースケールの近接ダメージと{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}が永続的に +1%上昇する。彼の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が最大値の50%以下の場合、この{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}は2倍となる。

languages.text: Каждое убийство рукопашным оружием бессрочно увеличивает наносимый в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} Винтерскейла на 1%. Когда у него остается меньше 50% от максимального {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, эти {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} удваиваются.
languages.original_text: Every kill with a melee weapon permanently increases Winterscale's melee damage and {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armour{/g} by +1%. While he has less than 50% maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, those {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} are doubled.

traits.locale_text: Каждое убийство рукопашным оружием бессрочно увеличивает наносимый в ближнем бою урон и {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}броню{/g} Винтерскейла на 1%. Когда у него остается меньше 50% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}, эти {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} удваиваются.

Каждое убийство рукопашным оружием бессрочно увеличивает наносимый в ближнем бою урон и {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}броню{/g} Винтерскейла на 1%. Когда у него остается меньше 50% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}, эти {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} удваиваются.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Yakın dövüş{/g} silahıyla yaptığı her öldürüş, Winterscale'in kalıcı olarak yakın dövüş {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarını{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırhını{/g} +%1 artırır. Maksimum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanının %50'sinden daha azına sahipken bu {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuslar{/g} iki katına çıkar.
languages.original_text: Every kill with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon permanently increases Winterscale's melee {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by +1%. While he has less than 50% of his maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, those {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} are doubled.
